media.headline: Cards challenge out at second
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Carpenter safe after call overturned in 1st
media.bigblurb: Ben Zobrist drops the flip at second but Matt Carpenter is ruled out, after the Cardinals challenge the call is overturned in the 1st

media.headline: Adams' RBI single
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Adams plates Carpenter with single to right
media.bigblurb: Matt Adams doubles the Cardinals' lead to 2-0 by grounding a ball through the right side in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Grichuk's RBI single
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Grichuk knocks in Molina with a single
media.bigblurb: Randal Grichuk pulls a ball through the left side of the infield, bringing home a run to give the Cardinals a 3-0 lead in the 1st inning

media.headline: Cubs turn a double play
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Cubs get a double play in the 2nd inning
media.bigblurb: John Lackey induces a ground ball to third base from Aledmys Diaz, starting a 5-4-3 double play in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Lynn strikes out Bryant
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Lynn catches Bryant looking at strike three
media.bigblurb: Lance Lynn freezes Kris Bryant in the top of the 1st inning, getting a called strike three for his first K of the season

media.headline: Jay's RBI single
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Jay knocks home Heyward to get Cubs on board
media.bigblurb: Jon Jay smacks a single up the middle to bring home Jason Heyward, cutting the Cubs' deficit to 3-1 in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Diaz scores on error
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Carpenter safe after review, Diaz scores
media.bigblurb: Ben Zobrist can't hang on to the ball at second and Matt Carpenter is safe after a review, allowing Aledmys Diaz to score in the 1st

media.headline: Molina's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Molina brings home Diaz with a sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Yadier Molina lifts a sacrifice fly to bring home Aledmys Diaz and extend the Cardinals' lead to 4-1 in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Russell's RBI groundout
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Russell plates Rizzo with a groundout
media.bigblurb: Addison Russell grounds out to second base, allowing Anthony Rizzo to score to cut the Cubs' deficit to 4-2 in the 6th inning

media.headline: Zobrist's nice sliding stop
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Zobrist slides to rob Wong of a base hit
media.bigblurb: Ben Zobrist slides to his right to make a nice backhanded stop, then fires to first to retire Kolten Wong in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Schwarber's go-ahead home run
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Schwarber hammers a go-ahead three-run shot
media.bigblurb: Kyle Schwarber cranks a three-run home run into the right-field seats, putting the Cubs ahead 5-4 in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Ball gets clingy with Molina
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Molina has a baseball stick to his gear
media.bigblurb: Matt Szczur strikes out on a ball in the dirt, but the ball sticks to Yadier Molina's chest protector, successfully hiding from the catcher

media.headline: Russell's RBI groundout
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Russell plates Bryant on groundout down line
media.bigblurb: Addison Russell grounds out on a dribbler down the first-base line, allowing Kris Bryant to score and extend the Cubs' lead to 6-4

media.headline: Edwards Jr. strikes out Gyorko
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Edwards Jr. K's Gyorko to escape trouble
media.bigblurb: With the tying runs on base, Carl Edwards Jr. catches Jedd Gyorko looking at strike three to escape a jam in the 8th inning

media.headline: Davis nails down the save
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Davis retires Diaz to lock down the save
media.bigblurb: Wade Davis gets Aledmys Diaz to fly out to right field, securing the save and the rubber match of the series by a score of 6-4

media.headline: Matheny on losing series to Cubs
media.blurb: STL@CHC: Matheny on dropping opening series to Cubs
media.bigblurb: Cardinals manager Mike Matheny discusses Lance Lynn's start, as well as the plays that were and weren't made against the Cubs in the loss

media.headline: Statcast: Schwarber's 112-mph HR
media.blurb: CHC@STL: Schwarber belts a three-run shot at 112-mph
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the exit velocity, launch angle and projected distance on Kyle Schwarber's three-run home run against the Cardinals

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG : CHC@STL
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: CHC@STL

media.headline: Must C: Molina loses ball
media.blurb: Must C Comical: Ball sticks to Molina's equipment
media.bigblurb: Must C Comical: Yadier Molina blocks a pitch in the dirt and looks to throw to first, but it sticks to his chest protector behind the plate

media.headline: Recap: CHC 6, STL 4
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Schwarber's homer lifts Cubs over Cardinals
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Kyle Schwarber hit a three-run blast in the 7th inning to put the Cubs ahead for good, as they defeated the Cardinals 6-4
